thread.title: Man dies after shooting at College Park MARTA station
thread.title_full: Man dies after shooting at College Park MARTA station

author: Ellen Eldridge
title: Man dies after shooting at College Park MARTA station
text:
A man died after he was shot at the College Park MARTA station Thursday, police said.
The man, whose name is being withheld pending notification of next of kin, was taken to Grady Memorial Hospital shortly after the 5:30 p.m. shooting, MARTA spokeswoman Alisa Jackson said.
Cops: Man murdered MARTA train rider after request for money
No bond for Macon woman charged in fatal MARTA shooting
Bystander killed in crossfire near Five Points MARTA station
MARTA police did capture a suspect, but that personâ€™s name has not been released, Jackson said.
No further information was available.
